Subject: Things Cleared Up
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Unitron/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:




Unitron sidestepped, the plasma charges passing by him, and missing the other 
two Alliance members next to him, striking a wall.  Unitron rasied both 
weapons to point at Hot Rod's head, but the female stepped out.  Unitron 
ignored her, and was about to pull the triggers, even though she was in front 
of his weapons, but he stopped and frowned when Zardus stepped in between him 
and Hot Rod.

"I didn't have anything to do with this!" Scattershot yelled, trying to hid 
his automatic rifle behind his back.  "I...was trying to break it up!  Yeah, 
that's the ticket.  I was breaking it up!"

"I was merely watching out of amusement." Nemesis Enforcer said with a smile 
as he lowered his weapon, the rapid-firing laser rifle disappearing into 
subsapce.

"He's a new recruit?  Heh.  He may have a new paint job, but if he's crazy 
enough to think he's Hot Rod, he's not one to trust.  I warn you Zardus, 
don't trust him with anything, and I mean ANYTHING important until he's 
either killed another Maximal or brought us vital information.  And even 
then, I wouldn't trust him." Unitron said, turning and walking off towards 
his quarters, his rifles disappearing into his private subspace pocket.

Nemesis Enforcer watched Zardus leave, and headed for the Alliance bridge, 
keeping his optics on the two autoguns that had extended from the ceiling.

Scattershot transformed to his bald eagle mode and flew after Nemesis.
